Translations.Text: [Potom] My poselili synov Isra'ila v blagodatnoy strane, nadelili ikh blagami, i mezh nimi ne bylo raznoglasiy, poka k nim ne prishlo znaniye. Voistinu, tvoy Gospod' v Sudnyy den' rassudit ikh raznoglasiya
Yesli ty somnevayesh'sya v tom, chto My nisposlali tebe, to sprosi tekh, kotoryye chitayut prezhniye pisaniya. Ved' k tebe yavilas' istina ot tvoyego Gospoda, tak ne bud' zhe somnevayushchimsya
Ne bud' takzhe v chisle tekh, kotoryye otritsali znameniya Allakha, a ne to okazhesh'sya s temi, kto pones uron
Voistinu, te, o kotorykh podtverdilos' slovo Allakha, ne uveruyut
yesli dazhe im yavyatsya vse znameniya, poka ne postignet ikh muchitel'noye nakazaniye

Razve khotya by v odnom selenii uverovali zhiteli i im pomogla vera, krome naroda Yunusa? Kogda oni uverovali, My izbavili ikh ot pozornogo nakazaniya v etoy zhizni i razreshili im pol'zovat'sya [blagami zhizni] do opredelennogo vremeni
Yesli by tvoy Gospod' zakhotel, to vse, kto yest' na zemle, bez isklyucheniya uverovali by. A ty razve stal by prinuzhdat' lyudey k vere
Ni odin chelovek ne uveruyet, krome kak s dozvoleniya Allakha, kotoryy i podvergayet nakazaniyu tekh, kto ne razumeyet
Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Zadumaytes' o tom, chto na nebesakh i na zemle". I ne budet pol'zy ot znameniy i uveshchevaniy tem, kto ne uveroval
Neuzheli oni mogut zhdat' chego-libo inogo, chem to, chto postiglo ikh predshestvennikov [iz nevernykh]? Skazhi: "Zhdite, i ya s vami podozhdu
Potom My spasem Nashikh poslannikov i uverovavshikh. Takim obrazom Nam nadlezhit spasat' veruyushchikh
